description: This token represents a Curve liquidity pool. Holders earn fees from users trading in the pool, and can also deposit the LP to Curve's gauges to earn CRV emissions. This metapool contains 3Crv (DAI, USDC, and USDT) and OUSD, a decentralzed stablecoin backed 1:1 by other stablecoins.

en.description: This token represents a Curve liquidity pool. Holders earn fees from users trading in the pool, and can also deposit the LP to Curve's gauges to earn CRV emissions. This metapool contains 3Crv (DAI, USDC, and USDT) and OUSD, a decentralzed stablecoin backed 1:1 by other stablecoins.

es.description: Este token representa un grupo de liquidez de Curve. Los titulares obtienen tarifas de los usuarios que comercian en el grupo y también pueden depositar el LP en los gauges de Curve para obtener emisiones de CRV. Este metapool contiene 3Crv (DAI, USDC y USDT) y OUSD, una moneda estable descentralizada respaldada 1:1 por otras monedas estables.

zh.description: 此代币是 Curve 的流动性池代币。代币持有者可以赚取交易费，也可以将代币存入 Curve gauge 以获得 CRV 奖励。其中包含 3Crv (DAI, USDC, USDT) 和 OUSD，OUSD 是锚定 $1 的并且是由其它稳定币支持的去中心化稳定币。
